message.body: Hey. So we changed Ryans party. Only have one. I'll need a cake for like 35 people and a small smash cake. I am throwing my mom a surprise 50th the next weekend August 9th. Could you do that one as well?
Hey yea that should be fine. What do you need fine with the surprise cake? I know I have another order that weekend but its a simple cake
Just something real simple. Either a two layer cake or a half sheet cake.

Easy to remember lol that's my moms name too... ok ill price it up when I price Ryan's. I'll get back to you by this weekend.. I apologize for the delay, im doing close to 60 hours a week at my day job now which has been stressful and 14 hours at a second job. Do its been busy
Thank you so much. I know how you feel. I work 40 hours and then part time at home nights and weekends.
Yea no problem! I appreciating you coming to us for the cakes!
